name: Adventure Map Woodland Caribou Provincial Park Map
description: Looking for a quiet, secluded area? With access only by boat or plane, Woodland Caribou Provincial Park is the retreat you've been looking for. There are over 4,000 square kilometers of scenic lakes, rivers, waterfalls and wetlands. Includes access points, portages, lake elevations, sample routes and information on backcountry procedures, natural history, fishing, safety tips and contact information to help you plan your getaway. Also includes the town of Red Lake.
